name: Next Generation Welfare Society
briefDescription: Next Generation Welfare Society is located in Faizabad, Uttar Pradesh.Our organization “Next Generation Welfare Society” is a society of welfares of next generation, and belongs to the sector of “Education and Literacy”. We are working in this field since 2012 and registered under Society act- 21, 1860. We have highly qualified team of technologists, psychologist and expertise of social sectors, which are the key resources of our educational programs. in our organization have 11 committee members. one president, one vice president, secretory, joint secretory, accountant and six general members. and the other hand under our organization running many centers and institutions. and many employee and volunteer working under it. we have 8 full time person and 20 volunteers.
